description: 75m² house with TERRACE to move into. Consisting of a living room, three bedrooms, kitchen and bathroom. The bathroom is spacious, has a bathtub with a glass screen, a sink and an exterior window. The master bedroom is a good-sized double, decorated with restored metallic furniture with pink details, and has a built-in wardrobe with excellent storage space. The second bedroom is double, has a single bed, custom designed desk and wardrobe. The third bedroom is single and has a wardrobe, it is prepared to become a youth bedroom. It has white lacquered windows, the apartment is heated with individual natural gas heating and air conditioning. The appliances that have a warranty are A/C, the Boiler, the IRI and the Oven. The property has an elevator and is located in an unbeatable location in a strategic point of the city, five minutes from the historic center of the city, in one of the best areas of Torrejón de Ardoz, with all the essential services within reach, such as supermarkets and pharmacies. The housing's academic offering is exceptional, among which the CEIP La Gaviota stands out. The house is surrounded by green and leisure areas, among them the renowned Europa Park stands out.
